title: Strengthening Customer Service Competencies: Patient Safety Competency Training Using Informal Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners identify three or more patient safety risk factors in real-world medical scenarios
Learners propose two or more patient safety reporting systems within hierarchical cultural contexts
Learners will write at least one improvement plan for patient safety through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
